name: My Wife is a Heavenly Big Shot
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: The opening scene mentions a wife who has reached her power ceiling, who still wants a bicycle, and demands to eat only soft rice?! But when Xiao Yifeng said I was really your husband, I was nearly strangled to death by this future wife… something’s not right, I must have taken the wrong script!Original Webcomic
